plugin.name: SurfaceReconstruction
plugin.author: federico.ferri.it@gmail.com
plugin.description: API functions for surface reconstruction from point clouds

command.name: reconstruct_scale_space
command.description: Reconstruct a mesh from the given point cloud

param.name: neighbors
param.description: number of neighbors a point's neighborhood should contain on average

param.name: samples
param.description: number of points sampled to estimate the neighborhood radius

param.name: squared_radius
param.description: neighborhood squared radius used for principal component analysis. if this is positive, neighbors and samples will be ignored

param.name: shapeHandle
param.description: handle of the shape with the reconstructed mesh, or -1 if failed
